amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to prohibit the Superintendent of a Service Academy from allowing a cadet or midshipman who is male from participating in an athletic program or activity that is designated exclusively for females.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Superintendent of a Service Academy from allowing a cadet or midshipman who is male from participating in an athletic program or activity that is designated exclusively for females.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 201 (Roll no. 247).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 201 (Roll no. 247).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
